channel.title: How do I add a shop to a 508 server and put items in it
channel.description:
Help!!!! I am using a 508 server and it has no shops.cfg or anything, it only has one .CFG file and thats the (Item.cfg) file. Plz help me or give me a tutorial, my msn is 90nineskillz-haydo@live.com.au talk to me on there or here. plz help :confused:
[Edit] My msn is down atm so sorry, ill try get it back up
